metadata.title: CVE-2017-6962 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in apng2gif 1.7. There is an integer overflowresulting in a heap-based buffer overflow. This is related to theread_chunk function making an unchecked addition of 12.

criterions.comment: apng2gif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
